overview:
Jerome Touze, 31, is the Co-founder & Co-CEO of WAYN.com (Where Are You Now?)

With over 18 million members worldwide, WAYN.com is the largest travelling social community online with members in 193 countries.

Jerome has been deeply involved in the latest Web 2.0 technologies and gained invaluable insights into the various means online businesses are emphasising on their brand awareness and developing a strong user base by using the so called â€œSelf Generated Content Strategiesâ€. Jerome was also an â€œEnterprising Young Britsâ€ Finalist as Business Entrepreneur of the Year; a â€œYoung Gunâ€, class of 2007 according to Growing Business Magazine and Commended for Entrepreneur of the Year 2008 at the UK Technology Innovation and Growth Awards. More recently Jerome was a finalist at the Ernst & Young London Entrepreneur of the Year Awards.

He also sits on the board of Aroxo.com, an upcoming online trading platform based in the UK and India and is an investor and advisor in a new start-up company called NSYGHT.com, a real time social search engine, about to be launched

Prior to founding WAYN.com, Jerome was a Consultant in Telecommunications and High Tech at Accenture, working primarily on CRM solutions for major accounts such as British Telecommunications and Microsoft.

He holds a BA Hons in European Management from the CESEM Business School in France and a BA Hons in Business & Finance from the University of Westminster, London. He loves travelling, Rugby and has a passion for Classical music.
